en.address: Flat 12, First Floor, Souq Al-Khoud, Al Khaudh A' Tijiary St, 3353 Way, Seeb 132
en.hours:
Sat - Thu: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM
Friday: Closed
en.heroSubtitle: Your smile is our passion. We provide compassionate, state-of-the-art dental care for the entire family.
en.servicesIntro: Comprehensive care for a healthy, beautiful smile.
en.whyChooseUsSubtitle: Experience dental care that puts you first.
en.whyItem1Desc: We use the latest painless technology to ensure your comfort and provide precise, effective treatments.
en.whyItem2Desc: Our team consists of highly skilled and certified dentists dedicated to continuous learning and excellence.
en.whyItem3Desc: Our clinic is designed to be a calm and welcoming space, helping you feel at ease from the moment you arrive.
en.serviceGeneralDesc: Routine check-ups, cleanings, and fillings to maintain optimal oral health.
en.serviceGeneralLongDesc: General dentistry is the foundation of a healthy smile. Our team provides comprehensive care, including regular check-ups, professional cleanings, and durable fillings. We focus on prevention and early detection to keep your teeth and gums healthy for a lifetime.
en.serviceCosmeticDesc: Enhance your smile with teeth whitening, veneers, and smile makeovers.
en.serviceCosmeticLongDesc: Achieve the brilliant smile you've always wanted. Our cosmetic services range from professional teeth whitening to custom-crafted porcelain veneers and complete smile makeovers. We combine artistry with advanced technology to create stunning, natural-looking results.
en.serviceOrthoDesc: Straighten your teeth with modern solutions like clear aligners and traditional braces.
en.serviceOrthoLongDesc: A straight smile is a confident smile. We offer a range of orthodontic solutions, including discreet clear aligners and effective traditional braces, to correct misalignments for patients of all ages. Let us help you achieve a healthier, more beautiful alignment.
en.serviceImplantsDesc: Permanent, natural-looking solutions for missing teeth.
en.serviceImplantsLongDesc: Dental implants are the gold standard for replacing missing teeth. They provide a strong, stable, and permanent solution that looks, feels, and functions just like a natural tooth. Restore your smile's function and appearance with our expert implant services.
en.faq1Question: How often should I visit the dentist?
en.faq1Answer: We recommend a routine check-up and cleaning every six months. This allows us to catch any potential issues early and keep your smile healthy.
en.faq2Answer: The procedure is performed under local anesthesia, so you won't feel any pain. Some mild discomfort is normal during recovery, but it is manageable with over-the-counter pain relievers.
en.faq3Question: How long does teeth whitening last?
en.faq3Answer: The effects of professional teeth whitening can last for several months to a few years, depending on your diet and oral hygiene habits. Avoiding staining foods and drinks will prolong the results.
en.faq4Answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment options to make dental care affordable. Please contact our front desk to discuss the options available to you.
en.reviewsSubtitle: Real reviews from our happy patients on Google.
en.review1: Honestly, thank God, I advise everyone to visit this clinic. Their work is 100% and the prices are very, very reasonable and affordable... Thank youğŸŒ¹
en.review2: The clinic is excellent and the service is wonderful. The entire staff is doing their job and more. I wish them all the best. I hope everyone goes and I don't lose out on my responsibility. Thank you.
en.review3: I thank Horizon Clinic, and I especially thank Dr. Nihal, frankly, the best dentist, and God willing, she is clear and honest with the patient. I thank you very much
en.aboutSubtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to your smile.
en.clinicPhilosophyText: At Horizon Medical Center, our philosophy is simple: to provide exceptional dental care in a warm, compassionate, and modern environment. We believe in building lifelong relationships with our patients based on trust, transparency, and a shared commitment to oral health. Your comfort and well-being are our highest priorities.
en.drAhmedBio: With over 15 years of experience, Dr. Nihal is a leader in cosmetic and restorative dentistry, dedicated to creating beautiful, healthy smiles.
en.drFatimaBio: Dr. Iman specializes in modern orthodontic solutions, helping patients of all ages achieve perfectly aligned teeth and a confident smile.
en.gallerySubtitle: See the stunning results we've achieved for our patients.
en.treatmentsSubtitle: A comprehensive list of our available dental treatments.
en.contactSubtitle: We're here to help. Contact us to schedule an appointment or ask any questions.
en.contactInfoSubtitle: Find us at our convenient location.
en.altClinicExterior: Exterior of Horizon Medical Center building
en.altClinicEntrance: Main entrance to Horizon Medical Center
en.formSuccessMessage: Thank you for reaching out. We will get back to you shortly.
en.footerAbout: Providing gentle, modern, and compassionate dental care for the entire family.
en.serviceRetreatRoot: Retreat Root Canal Anterior Tooth / Root
en.servicePFMBase: Porcelain Fused To Metal - Base Metal Crown
en.servicePFMCeramic: Porcelain Fused To Metal - Ceramic Crown
